com.nmoumoulidis.opensensor.view
Class MainActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
                      com.nmoumoulidis.opensensor.view.MainActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

The main UI class, launched when the user launches the app. Aside from setting up the UI, it is responsible for initialization REST requests (sensor list, batch-data) upon startup, and managing the information state of the available data.

Author:
Nikos Moumoulidis
